title: Drone Mothership Anomaly
summary: The Drone Mothership Anomaly is an old anomaly removed from the game. It contained a large Drone ship. Due to the old anomaly naming system, this anomaly type had no specific letter combo associated with it. It was removed at some point before the anomaly revamp.
full_text:
Drone Mothership Anomaly
The Drone Mothership Anomaly is an old anomaly removed from the game. It contained a large Drone ship. Due to the old anomaly naming system, this anomaly type had no specific letter combo associated with it. It was removed at some point before the anomaly revamp. 
Media
These links show proof of the anomalies existence.
Screen Shot
Video Evidence
 
Trivia
The unfinished anomaly was intended to later be developed into an anomaly raid boss, until it was delayed and later removed for unknown reasons. However, there is a section in the Development Roadmap that may reference this old anomaly; the "Expanded Infantry Combat" section mentions "ground combat-centric anomalies, such as a Dreadnought raid" 
This anomaly may have been the early form of the Drone Battleship.
